newsitem.title: USA: Mighty Power and GlobeNet Inc to merge.
newsitem.headline: Mighty Power and GlobeNet Inc to merge.

text.p: Mighty Power U.S.A. Inc and privately-held GlobeNet Inc, both direct marketing companies, said on Tuesday their boards approved a merger plan and name change to GlobeNet International Inc.

Mighty Power said its shareholders approved in principle the actions, which included a reverse split of one share of stock for every seven shares previously held, reducing the total outstanding shares of the company to 4,235,714.
GlobeNet approved in principle an offer of 2.26 share of Mighty Power for each GlobeNet share, they said.
GlobeNet markets a line of nutritious food supplements. Mighty Power U.S.A. markets a line of herbs, household and auto care products.
Clinton Howard would serve as chairman of the board, president and chief executive of GlobeNet International Inc, they said.
